org.springframework.statemachine.config

Annotation Type EnableWithStateMachine


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Inherited
 @Documented
 @Component
 @Configuration
 @Import(value=StateMachineAnnotationPostProcessorConfiguration.class)
public @interface EnableWithStateMachine
    Annotation which enables features needed for WithStateMachine.
    Author:
    Janne Valkealahti
